assetProfile.address2: 31st Floor Rama 3 Road Chong Nonsi, Yannawa
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: SVOA Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision of information technology (IT) products and services in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: IT Distribution, Systems Integration, IT Outsourcing Services, and IT Project. It assembles and distributes computers under SVOA Computer brand; distributes IT products, such as computers, notebooks, printing and gaming equipment, projectors, scanners, sticker and metal cutters, and education and industry robots; and consumables, including inks, bulbs, and blades. The company also provides custom printing services; installation, repair, and maintenance services for IT products through authorized dealers, as well as operates and manages authorized service centers on behalf of supplier brands; and offers digital network equipment, cybersecurity solutions, management software for Personal Data Protection Act, and 3D Computer-Aided Design software for architecture, engineering, and construction design. In addition, it provides IT consulting services; end-to-end IT solutions, including hardware and software installation, system implementation, and system maintenance service after initiating implementation for banking, industrial, telecommunications, insurance, savings cooperatives, hospitals, government agencies, and general customers; and IT outsourcing services comprising co-location, dedicated server, web and email hosting, disaster recovery support with outsource, ATM application, and enterprise resource planning solutions. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
